channel.title: Panic Emote Frame #? Please?
channel.description: Hey whats the frame # for the panic emote so I can change the words in the button?

item.title: Panic Emote Frame #? Please?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

So I add it, but can you explain more thoroughly on how to use it? what’s the 1000 and what’s the 2000? And how would I check for the panic emote?

Read full topic

item.title: Panic Emote Frame #? Please?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

heres a frame checker… to use it type ::frame frames 1000 2000

if (command.startsWith("frames")) { try {
int SFrame = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int EFrame = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12,16));
for(int FrameS = SFrame; FrameS < EFrame; FrameS++) {
sendQuest(""+FrameS, FrameS);
}
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as frames 1000 2000"); } }

when you use it it will have the frame number where you want for it
some frames wont beable to handled by the client.heres some of the frames i got so far…

Game Options:		917
